CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: 9c Very recently , our group reported a broad bandgap D-A copolymer PzNDTTPD based on 4,9-bis(2-ethylhexyloxy)-naphtho [1,2-b:5,6-b′]dithiophene and thieno [3,4-c]pyrrole-4,6dione ( TPD ).

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| D-A copolymer PzNDTTPD |
| 4,9-bis(2-ethylhexyloxy)-naphtho [1,2-b:5,6-b′]dithiophene |
| thieno [3,4-c]pyrrole-4,6dione (TPD) |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| D-A copolymer PzNDTTPD |
| 4,9-bis(2-ethylhexyloxy)-naphtho [1,2-b:5,6-b′]dithiophene |
| thieno [3,4-c]pyrrole-4,6dione (TPD) |

I have reviewed the paragraph and all the entities identified can be considered as material names. The first one is a copolymer, the second one is a derivative of naphtho dithiophene, and the third one is a heterocyclic compound.
